Package Models

Class Promotion

java.lang.Object
Models.Item
Models.Promotion
public class Promotion extends Item
A model that represents the promotion packages which extends the class Item.
Since:
10 October 2021

    • Promotion

      public Promotion(int id, String name, String desc, double cost, List<String> itemsInc)
      Constructs the Promotion object.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the promotion.
      name - The name of the promotion.
      desc - The description of the promotion.
      cost - The price of the promotion.
      itemsInc - The items' parameters in the order, id; name; description and price in string list
